room_title: Escape room "Nightmare on Main Street" by Entrapme in Waterville
room_address: 105 Main Street, Suite B & C Waterville, ME 04901
room_description:
You take a babysitting gig watching little Mary, to try and make some extra cash. After meeting the parents and the child for the first time they leave for the night telling you they’d be back early the next morning. You wish them well and go about your time watching the child.
Watching TV, you doze off until you hear a blood-curdling scream. You jump up and look around to get your bearings. You then run up the stairs to Mary’s room. You enter the toy room that leads to Mary’s room and crib but as soon as you get inside the door shuts behind you. You try to open it but it is locked and you hear the scream coming from Mary’s room.
You’ll now have an hour to try and save little Mary and get out of the room or else be trapped forever!
